0 Param data.1 string m_text: I never thought we'd meet quite like this. Did you, former sovereign?
Just give up. You'll never be able to rule this realm.
How dare you speak to me like that, filth!
You still have much to answer for.
What were you plotting at the First Pillar?
Why does it matter? Do you want in?
Choose your words carefully.
You are hardly in a position to bargain with me.
Then we'll await the destruction together.
What destruction?
Even as we speak, the despair of everyone who's ever been reincarnated gathers in the depths of the earth, growing. Biding its time until it awakens.
Is that so?
And once it awakens, it will consume the kingdom.
It must be wiped out, and we're looking for a way to get the job done.
Lies.
Then open the door below and see for yourself.
Oh, right. You can't.
I see you are incapable of minding your own tongue.
Mother, perhaps we should at least see for ourselves.
Very well.
If you find nothing, I shall have you executed on the spot. As many times as it takes.
After which the current sovereign shall be publicly executed.
I won't let you do that.
What is this!?
It's exactly as the mural depicted. It's here. I can feel its presence.
The darkness shed during reincarnation. A graveyard of hopes and dreams.
Let us press onward.
So this is what will destroy the realm?
The precepts state that souls attempt to carry hopes and dreams into the next life.
Yet at the same time they must cast aside their anger, sadness, and hatred.
All that darkness sinks into the depths of the earth.
And that's what we're looking at?
What happens if we touch it?
No idea.
Well then!
We've come all this way. Shall we see what happens?
No!
You have no choice in the matter.
Did you not say that this pool of darkness will destroy the kingdom?
Then find a way to prevent the annihilation of the realm! But remember that our patience is not infinite.
Should the mass rise up, we will execute her.
Soju!
Don't listen to them.
Sooner or later we have to learn the truth behind reincarnation.
None of this changes anything.
I'll come back.
Soju!
What is this place?
Have I reached the bottom of the pool?
Or am I Beyond the Veil?
Hey, kid!
Stop thinking. It's not worth it.
Sorry?
There's no hope here.
Welcome to the Shadow Pool. Or should I say, the Oni.
The Oni?
Yes. We're inside now.
When souls shed their negativity as they cross into the next life, it gathers here.
This is the dark side of reincarnation. Anger, sadness, hatred... It's all here.
That's what makes the Oni.
And once the Oni gets big enough, it will leave the Shadow Pool and devour the Living World.
As long as there are humans, the Oni will exist.
No matter how many times you kill it, it will only come back.
Humans birthed the Oni.
The world was once vast, but the Oni destroyed a little more of it each time it woke. Now, this realm is all that remains.
And soon this realm will be destroyed, too.
The Oni will devour the kingdom the next time it awakens.
So that's how it works.
The Oni will exist as long as humans do. If the humans die, so will the Oni.
The only way to destroy the Oni is to destroy mankind.
How do you know all this, exactly?
I lost my life in a battle with the Oni, long before this kingdom existed.
It devoured my very soul.
There were many more like me, but in time they all became part of the Oni, and joined the ranks of the Fallen.
I am the only one left.
So I wait in this hopeless place until I, too, become one of the Fallen.
I am so, so tired.
Give up, if you know what's best for you. You'll find no hope here.
What was that?
You saw it? That was an illusion.
Fragments of the hopes and dreams consumed by the Oni found their way to you and showed you another world.
They must think you're their last hope in a world without it.
I saw the same thing, once. But not anymore.
Soon you'll be waiting to turn into one of the Fallen, like me.
You're a ghost of lost hopes, with nowhere left to go.
Welcome to Tayu!
I'm looking for a way to defeat the Oni.
Oh yeah? Well then—
Leshan, come quickly. She's about to give birth!
I'll be right there!
Pardon me, traveler. I'll hand you off to—
Get going, Leshan! I'll keep the traveler company.
Thank you. Then I must take my leave!
He's a smart kid, eh? Smarter than a lot of the adults around here.
So what brings you here?
I want to find a way to defeat the Oni.
I see, I see. In that case, you'll want to talk to our warriors.
Just wait a while. They'll be back.
Thank you.
What's wrong? Did something happen?
Some of the Fallen appeared nearby. Everyone left to fight them off, but it's not going well.
Flee while you can, just to be safe!
I can handle a blade. Let me join you.
Thank you!
We must move quickly! They're fighting to the west of the village.
There they are.
Thanks for the help. I'm Rada.
I'm Kagachi.
I hear you're looking for a way to defeat the Oni?
Well, you'd better hurry. The increase in the number of Fallen means the Oni will soon awaken.
We warriors must be prepared for the battle ahead.
I imagine you'd—
Father! Nakia's been blessed with a healthy baby boy!
Wonderful! I'll be right there!
I believe it was destiny that brought us together, Master Kagachi. Please, come.
Are you well, Nakia?
Yes, Father.
Have you settled on a name?
I have. I will call him Ruto.
A fine name indeed. Hello there, little Ruto.
New life. That's what gives people hope.
Look! The storm has stopped! The gods smile upon us!
Ruto is truly blessed!
Do you have a moment, Master Kagachi?
What is this!
The world was once vast, but the Oni destroyed a little more of it each time it woke. Now, this realm is all that remains.
So this is the world as it used to be.
And we have a name for it.
The Wailing Realm.
Wailing Realm?
The realm where the Oni dwells.
Where the Oni grows until it can rise up to destroy mankind.
It has done so time and time again, as you can see from this ravaged world.
The last several thousand years of history are but the chronicles of a single war. Few humans remain after the countless cycles of peace and war.
This time, however, we shall bring the tragedy to a close. We shall defeat the Oni.
The Oni will exist as long as humans do. If the humans die, so will the Oni.
The only way to destroy the Oni is to destroy mankind.
I've heard the Oni is born from the hearts and minds of humans. That to stop the Oni, we must destroy ourselves.
Even if that proves true, we cannot lay down our arms.
We have lives to protect.
So you plan to fight the Oni?
Of course.
I plan to join my fellow soldiers at this very moment.
You can't! You're in no shape to fight!
Let me take your place, Father. Stay behind and continue to lead our village.
They are the only reason I have made it this far.
Though my work is not yet done, my life belongs to them.
Father, please.
Above all...
...I must serve as an example for you. I must be your guiding light.
Don't fret, my son. It is not yet my time.
Can I entrust you to watch over us and see this through?
Should the worst come to pass, you must flee.
Carry what you have learned here into the next life, so that the Oni may be destroyed.
Understood. Let's go.
Take care of everyone, Leshan.
I will, Father, so long as I live.
Take care of my father.
We shall soon set out for the Wailing Realm.
I know we have fought for what feels like an eternity. This battle shall be no easier than the last.
We have seen countless numbers of our own fall in battle.
But I am here to tell you we have nothing to fear!
Each blow you strike brings the light of a new dawn to the Living World!
My fellow soldiers!
We fight to protect the ones we love!
We fight to protect the Living World and secure peace for our own!
We fight for the future!
For the future!
Who is it?
Yavel, it's me.
Rada!
And who's this?
My name is Kagachi. I'm a traveler.
Welcome, Kagachi.
What is this place?
A graveyard for fallen soldiers.
They risked their lives fighting for their families and the world they knew.
What's that all about?
Oho?
Are the customs different where you're from?
This is a prayer. That child is asking their ancestors for protection.
And the dead will actually protect them?
It's a lovely thought, isn't it?
Whether alive or dead, life is the tie that binds us.
Isn't that what it means to be human?
Come on, Kagachi. We have to hurry.
Kagachi, you stay here.
No, I'm coming with you!
It is crucial that you survive. You must tell the story of this battle.
That is your role in all of this.
The time has come. The Oni awakens.
Are you the first sacrifices?
Who are you?
I am the Oni made flesh, and also its keeper. I am the Oni Priestess.
And yet you have no guardians beside you. Why appear before us unprotected?
I am the only Oni in this kingdom.
So there are no others?
You doubt me? I speak only truth.
I am but one being hidden among the human masses. No human has guessed my true nature.
Do you wish to see for yourself? Then prepare for battle, for you must go through me!
You deceive humans to nurture the Oni?
How simple-minded of you.
Humans create despair as they live their lives. I need deceive no one.
This kingdom itself is but a cradle of human life built atop the Oni.
Ah, at last...
The time has come.
I look forward to watching you struggle, brave warriors.
Great Oni... Trust in my offspring when you rise again!
Have I broken free of the illusion?
I see you managed to avoid being absorbed by the Oni.
I saw a ray of hope disappear into the darkness.
But it's finally clear. I've figured out who knows the truth of this realm.
I have to get back to the Living World. Whatever it takes.
I understand.
But tell me.
Was my hope among that of the ray you saw go dark?
What's your name?
Leshan.
Let me think... Ah.
Yes, I saw it. Your dying hope.
You did? I'm amazed it held on for so long.
The Oni stirs.
It does that whenever evil swells in the Living World. There must be a great battle brewing.
There is. I can feel it. I have to return as soon as possible.
Is there a way to get back?
If there is, you'd better hurry.
You carry our hopes with you. I know you can do it.
I do? Since when?
You found us, didn't you? All those who had given up hope must have led you here.
This is where hope goes to die.
So we reject hope and embrace despair, follow the chain back, and return you to the Beyond.
Come on!
There!
Follow this chain. It will lead you back to the Beyond. I know you can make it.
No... They're all Fallen!
Please, I beg you: free them from their anguish.
Father... My friends...
Let's go. I may not be of much help, but I'll do what I can.
We've made it. This is the Beyond.
I knew you could do it. Thank you, Kagachi.
I was right to pin my hopes on you.
No, Leshan. The thanks belongs to you.
Oh, please. I'd be happy, if I could only remember how.
Say, Kagachi...
Do you think I'll see you in the next life, where the Oni doesn't exist?
Absolutely. I'm sure of it.
Good. I'll be waiting...
I can't let Sara die.
I can't let them kill her. Not yet.
